result.eng: We'll have a drink in a pub nearby.
result.ga: Beidh deoch againn i dteach tábhairne in aice láimhe
result.orig: Beidh deoch againn i dteach tábhairne in aice láimhe
result.html: Beidh deoch againn i dteach tábhairne in aice láimheWe'll have a drink in a pub nearby.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ deoċ againn i dteaċ táḃairne in aice láiṁeWe'll have a drink in a pub nearby.

result.eng: You will see the house on your left-hand side.
result.ga: Feicfidh tú an teach ar thaobh do láimhe clé
result.orig: Feicfidh tú an teach ar thaobh do láimhe clé
result.html: Feicfidh tú an teach ar thaobh do láimhe cléYou will see the house on your left-hand side.
result.ponchtml: Feicfiḋ tú an teaċ ar ṫaoḃ do láiṁe cléYou will see the house on your left-hand side.

result.eng: Two men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.
result.ga: Leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimhe
result.orig: Leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimhe
result.html: Leag beirt fhear go talamh í agus ghoid siad a mála láimheTwo men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.
result.ponchtml: Leag beirt ḟear go talaṁ í agus ġoid siad a mála láiṁeTwo men knocked her to the ground and stole her handbag.

result.eng: The mouse is on your right-hand side.
result.ga: Tá an luchóg ar thaobh do láimhe deise
result.orig: Tá an luchóg ar thaobh do láimhe deise
result.html: Tá an luchóg ar thaobh do láimhe deiseThe mouse is on your right-hand side.
result.ponchtml: Tá an luċóg ar ṫaoḃ do láiṁe deiseThe mouse is on your right-hand side.

result.eng: His mother led him by the hand to school.
result.ga: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoile
result.orig: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoile
result.html: Chuaigh sé lena mháthair ar ghreim láimhe go teach na scoileHis mother led him by the hand to school.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ sé lena ṁáṫair ar ġreim láiṁe go teaċ na scoileHis mother led him by the hand to school.

result.eng: He looked at the kid she was leading by the hand.
result.ga: D'amharc sé ar an tachrán ar ghreim láimhe léi
result.orig: D'amharc sé ar an tachrán ar ghreim láimhe léi
result.html: D'amharc sé ar an tachrán ar ghreim láimhe léiHe looked at the kid she was leading by the hand.
result.ponchtml: D'aṁarc sé ar an taċrán ar ġreim láiṁe léiHe looked at the kid she was leading by the hand.
